game.name: Rhythm Animal Café
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Welcome to ​Rhythm Animal Café​! Animals' daily chaos meets funky beats: boss hype, colleague woes, your slacking, unfair blame—all become hilarious one-tap rhythm games! Simple controls, joyful groove. Feel music fuse with daily life’s warmth!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to ​Rhythm Animal Café​! Animals' daily chaos meets funky beats: boss hype, colleague woes, your slacking, unfair blame—all become hilarious one-tap rhythm games! Simple controls, joyful groove. Feel music fuse with daily life’s warmth!
